title: Fence Painting
statement:
# Fence Painting

Farmer John wants to paint sections of his fence.

## Problem Description

Farmer John has a long fence represented as a number line. He wants to paint two sections of the fence: one section from A to B, and another from C to D (inclusive on both ends).

Determine the total length of fence that will be painted. Note that if the sections overlap, the overlapping portion should only be counted once.

## Input Format

Four space-separated integers A, B, C, D representing the two fence sections [A,B] and [C,D].

## Output Format

A single integer representing the total length of painted fence.

## Constraints

- 0 ≤ A ≤ B ≤ 100
- 0 ≤ C ≤ D ≤ 100
